abstract: The company will sell the right to buy an individual health policy in the future even if you become sick.
snippet: The company will sell the right to buy an individual health policy in the future even if you become sick.
lead_paragraph: For these economically uncertain times, the UnitedHealth Group has a “first of its kind” product: the right to buy an individual health policy at some point in the future even if you become sick.

headline.main: UnitedHealth to Insure the Right to Insurance
headline.print_headline: An Offer To Ensure The Right To Insurance
